Description:
You discover the rubble of an ancient altar, those altars are used to make offerings with magic shards to improve your skills.

The altar appears to have been destroyed on purpose and perhaps those who did are still nearby.

This altar is barely usable and in order for the offering to work, you will have to offer an additional amount of shards.
DescriptionAction: Using this altar under current conditions will cost you a little more.
